hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated:"Allah's Messenger cursed three people: A man who leads people (in Salat) while they dislike him, a woman who spends a night while her husband is angry with her, and a man who hears: 'Hayya Alal Falah (come to success)' then does not respond

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ أَمَّ قَوْمًا وَهُمْ لَهُ كَارِهُونَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related [About] Whoever Leads People (In Salat) While They Dislike Him
